properties.label: part number
properties.description: identifier of a particular part design of a device

properties.label: problem statement
properties.description: description of the issue or challenge that the workflow is designed to address

items.label: Mathematically reproducible workflow
items.description: workflow for which the mathematical results can be reproduced

items.label: Runtime reproducible workflow
items.description: workflow for which the runtime can be reproduced

items.label: Result reproducible workflow
items.description: workflow for which the result can be reproduced irrespective of mathematical deviations

items.label: Original device reproducible workflow
items.description: workflow which can be reproduced on original hardware or experimental devices

items.label: Cross-device reproducible workflow
items.description: workflow which can be reproduced on other hardware or experimental devices

items.label: Transferable workflow
items.description: workflow that can be transferred to other objectives, parameters, models, etc

items.label: Process step
items.description: a single action or stage within a longer process
